category: General Assembly of Delegates and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 24 (Non-face-to-face Board of Directors)
contents: Article 24 (Non-face-to-face Board of Directors) ① Pursuant to Article 35, Paragraph 8 of the Articles of Incorporation, the Board of Directors may be held through a remote video conference without all or part of the directors attending the same location. ② The board of directors meeting through remote video conferencing shall be held in accordance with the following provisions. 1. Directors who access the remote video conference system are deemed to have attended the board of directors meeting. 2. Board of directors conducting remote video conferences must keep the audio and video of the meeting and prepare minutes. ③ Article 20 (3) shall apply mutatis mutandis to the written resolution of the Board of Directors pursuant to Article 37 of the Articles of Incorporation. [This Article Newly Inserted on October 6, 2021]
